Now he's in ____, ____ his ____ for ____ next ____ months ____ to ____ for a marathon. He never has trouble sticking to his workout plans, even when they are very demanding.
data.partBlankContent: An active lifestyle is very important to Jesse. In hi__ school, he wo___ select a different fitness-related project ea__ summer. Now he's in col____, a__ his mis____ for t__ next sev____ months i_ to tr___ for a marathon. He never has trouble sticking to his workout plans, even when they are very demanding.
data.fullContent: An active lifestyle is very important to Jesse. In high school, he would select a different fitness-related project each summer. Now he's in college, and his mission for the next several months is to train for a marathon. He never has trouble sticking to his workout plans, even when they are very demanding.
data.answer: 积极的生活方式对Jesse来说非常重要。上高中时，他每年夏天都会选择不同的健身相关项目。现在他在上大学，他接下来几个月的任务是为马拉松进行训练。他从不为坚持自己的锻炼计划而烦恼，即使这些计划要求很高。
